name: iPandemic [iOS/Mac]
blurb: The world is under attack by a deadly disease...but this time you ARE the disease! A fully controllable hazard game.

rewards.reward: We love you for the support, no matter how small! Your name will enter the donor list on our website.
Pack of wallpapers for computer and iDevice + Mac version of game on release day for free + all of the above packages.
Digital soundtrack download + all of the above packages.
Mac beta access (spring 2013) + all of the above packages.
Early backer reward! Get access to the FULL iPandemic Mac game 15 days before everyone! Includes all previous awards.
Beta forum discussion boards with exclusive 'Kickstarter' rank + iPandemic launch sticker + letter of thanks + all of the above packages. (Add $7 for international shipping outside of United States)
iOS beta access (Spring 2013) + all above the packages. (Add $7 for international shipping outside of the United States)

iPandemic launch poster in HD (18'' x 24'') + Mac EARLY beta access 1 month before beta launch + EARLY beta forum access + all of the above unlimited packages. (Add $10 for international shipping outside of the United States)

iPandemic launch t-shirt + custom high quality IDS (Institute for Disease Spread) member ID card + SIGNED iPandemic launch poster in HD (18'' x 24'') + your name in the in-game credits + all of the above unlimited packages. (Add $15 for international shipping outside of the United States)

CD with high definition game tracks + SIGNED limited edition HD promo poster (only 100 ever made, they will all be numbered) + gold 'Kickstarter' forum rank + all of the above unlimited packages. (Add $20 for international shipping outside of the United States)
iOS EARLY beta access 1 month before beta launch + custom iPandemic iPod Touch or iPhone case + all of the above unlimited packages. (Add $25 for international shipping outside of the United States)

iPod Touch with custom iPandemic skin and alpha pre-installed (2 months before beta) + alpha discussion board access + emerald 'Kickstarter' rank + all of the above unlimited packages. (Only available in the United States and Canada)

LIMITED EDITION iPandemic box set - includes: iPod Touch with custom iPandemic skin and alpha pre-installed (2 months before beta), custom iPandemic gas mask, 2 flash drives and custom boxes with all electronic content and game on each one, IDS (Institute for Disease Spread) member ID card, SIGNED limited edition promo poster (low number out of 100 in production), pamphlet with developer diaries - early screenshots - hand drawings - and more, sheet of stickers, bumper sticker, and handwritten thank you note from developer + phone call directly from developer + name on front of website and social networks + name on App Store description + premium 'Kickstarter' rank on alpha forum. (Only available in the United States and Canada)

LIMITED EDITION [Ultimate] iPandemic box set - includes: iPad with custom iPandemic skin and alpha pre-installed (2 months before beta), custom iPandemic full hazmat suit, 2 flash drives and custom boxes with all electronic content and game on each one, IDS (Institute for Disease Spread) member ID card, SIGNED limited edition promo poster (low number out of 100 in production), game launch poster, pamphlet with developer diaries - early screenshots - hand drawings - and more, sheet of stickers, bumper sticker, and handwritten thank you note from developer + phone call directly from developer + official donor appreciation plaque + name on front of website and social networks + name on App Store description + priceless and premium 'Kickstarter' rank on alpha forum. (Only available in the United States and Canada)
